title: HARRRRD Hardwired LED Under Cabinet Task Lighting - 12 Watt, 18", Dimmable, CRI>90, 5000K (Day Light), Wide Body, Long Lasting Metal Base with Frost Lens
features: GUILT-FREE energy usage, only 12W! 18-inch LED light bar with wide area light distribution for use in closet spaces, cabinet, counters, shelves, bookcases and displays
GLARE-FREE frosted lens makes it easy on the eyes with warm bright light. Perfect size to fit under that one narrow cabinet. Check out our other sizes and color temperatures
DIMMABLE - Compatible with most dimmers. CRI>90 provides truer colors for your fruits and vegetables
HASSLE-FREE 5-year warranty with 50,000 hour lifetime, easy and fast replacement guaranteed! Conforms to UL 1598
SWEAT-FREE installation and maintenance with easy to follow installation instructions, and easy to clean aluminum housing with no bulbs to replace
